logmessage.method: noSuchMethodException(String target, String expected, String found)
logmessage.messagebody: No matching method has been found for class: "{0}". Expected method = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.messagedetail: No matching method has been found for class: "{0}". Expected method = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.cause: No matching method has been found for class: "{0}". Expected method = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.action: Specify a different method, arguments, or target class.

logmessage.method: noSuchConstructorException(String target, String expected, String found)
logmessage.messagebody: No matching constructor has been found for class: "{0}". Expected constructor = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.messagedetail: No matching constructor has been found for class: "{0}". Expected constructor = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.cause: No matching constructor has been found for class: "{0}". Expected constructor = "{1}", but found = "{2}".
logmessage.action: Specify a different constructor, arguments, or target class.

logmessage.messagebody: Invalid usage of "{0}" function. Function expects "{1}" arguments. Actual number of arguments used was = "{2}".
logmessage.messagedetail: Invalid usage of "{0}" function. Function expects "{1}" arguments. Actual number of arguments used was = "{2}".
logmessage.cause: Invalid usage of "{0}" function. Function expects "{1}" arguments. Actual number of arguments used was = "{2}".
logmessage.action: Specify correct number of arguments to function "{0}".

logmessage.method: illegalArgumentTypeForFunction(String functionSignature, String expected, Integer argument, String actual)
logmessage.messagebody: Illegal argument type for "{0}" function. Function expected type of "{1}" for argument number "{2}". Actual type used was = "{3}".
logmessage.messagedetail: Illegal argument type for "{0}" function. Function expected type of "{1}" for argument number "{2}". Actual type used was = "{3}".
logmessage.cause: Illegal argument type for "{0}" function. Function expected type of "{1}" for argument number "{2}". Actual type used was = "{3}".
logmessage.action: Specify correct argument type for function "{0}".

logmessage.messagebody: Illegal cast from type "{0}" to type "{1}".
Failed to convert from "{0}" to native CQL type "{1}".
logmessage.messagedetail: Failed to convert from "{0}" to native CQL type "{1}".
logmessage.cause: Failed to convert from "{0}" to native CQL type "{1}".
logmessage.action: Failed to convert from "{0}" to native CQL type "{1}".

logmessage.messagebody: Failed to convert from oracle.sql.TIMESTAMP type to native CQL type "{0}".
logmessage.messagedetail: Failed to convert from oracle.sql.TIMESTAMP type to native CQL type "{0}".
